CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Apttus_Config2__CollaborationRequestId__c != null, OR( TEXT(Apttus_Config2__CollaborationRequestId__r.Apttus_Config2__Status__c)="new", TEXT(Apttus_Config2__CollaborationRequestId__r.Apttus_Config2__Status__c)="submitted", TEXT(Apttus_Config2__CollaborationRequestId__r.Apttus_Config2__Status__c)="completed" ) ), "In Progress", "")
CustomField.label: Collaboration Status
